Author: Caraxi
Name: Simple Glamour Switcher
Description:
An alternative to using Glamourer for saving and reapplying outfits.
 - Allows for easy switching between multiple character setups.
 - Improved temporary mod settings, applying and reverting changes to individual slots.
 - Improved advanced dye application.

Requires Glamourer and Penumbra, with optional support for Honorific, Simple Heels and Customize+.
